oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Close Up the Honky-Tonks: Chuck Mead and Special Guests Pay Tribute to the Bakersfield Sound - 2014-12-13
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance titled "Close Up the Honky-Tonks" paying tribute to the Bakersfield Sound from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on December 13, 2014. Program presented as part of a Bakersfield exhibition.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chuck Mead; Cam; Caitlin Rose; Deke Dickerson; Suzy Bogguss; Chris Scruggs; James Burton;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Performers include Chuck Mead and the Grassy Knoll Boys, Cam (born Camaron Marvel Ochs), Caitlin Rose, Deke Dickerson, Suzy Bogguss, Chris Scruggs, James Burton. Hosted by Chuck Mead. Performances include; Close Up The Honky Tonks (Chuck Mead) -- I've Got A Tiger By The Tail (Chuck Mead) -- I Don't Hear You (Chuck Mead) -- Playboy (Chuck mead) -- Big, Big Love (Chuck Mead) -- Crying Time (Cam) -- Okie From Muskogee (Cam) -- Hello Trouble (Chuck Mead) -- Dear John (Caitlin Rose and Chuck Mead) -- Little Pink Mack (Caitlin Rose) -- Wishful Thinking (Caitlin Rose) -- L.A. International Airport (Caitlin Rose and Cam) -- Above And Beyond (Chuck Mead) -- Dim Lights, Thick Smoke And Loud, Loud Music (Deke Dickerson) -- Who'll Buy The Wine (Deke Dickerson) -- I Always Get A Souvenir (Deke Dickerson) -- My Heart Skips A Beat (Chuck Mead) -- Today I Started Loving You Again (Suzy Bogguss with Chris Scruggs) -- Let's Chase Each Other Around The Room (Suzy Bogguss with Chris Scruggs) -- Working Man Blues (Chuck Mead with James Burton) -- I'm A Lonesome Fugitive (Chuck Mead with James Burton) -- Mama Tried (Chuck Mead with James Burton) -- The Bottle Let Me Down (Chuck Mead and guests)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Mead, Chuck; Ochs, Camaron Marvel; Cam; Rose, Caitlin; Bogguss, Suzy; Dickerson, Deke; Scruggs, Chris; Burton, James, 1939-; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
